ModMetaData.name: Terraform Technology
ModMetaData.author: Vovik
ModMetaData.description:
This is a core mod to provide functionality for any terraforming. Example functionality: > in-tile terraforming: > removing soil > placing soil > removing non-moving water > placing non-moving water > placing natural walls > reconstructing natural walls > retrieving resources by removing natural tiles
Built-in functionality: > placing natural walls > reconstructing natural walls > increase chance to get rock chunks to 100%
Future plans: - resource nodes constructing (for terraforming completeness of functionality reasons) - earthquake event (with resource generation in mountains) - reintroduce tornado event (with bringing in chunks of resources, animals, plants, terrain changes) - world map tiles terraforming
